item.title: Master Author (Level 11)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 10)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Master Fisherman (Level 11)
item.description: Look for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.

item.title: Master Blacksmith (Level 9)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Butcher (Level 6)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Master Presenter (Level 11)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Miller (Level 5)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 943 times with git add -p.

item.title: Master Historian (Level 13)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Master Collector (Level 10)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Master Seamstress (Level 8)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Master Thug (Level 8)
item.description: Forced pushed a branch with git push -f

item.title: Hunter (Level 6)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Hunter (Level 5)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Hunter (Level 4)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Inventor (blameall)
item.description: Used a command that isn't part of the built in Git command

item.title: Apprentice Tree Trimmer (Level 3)
item.description: Rewrite branches with git filter-branch

item.title: Master Pilgrim (Level -inf)
item.description: Performed a rebase using git rebase --onto.

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 3)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Homeowner
item.description: Set global email address using git config.

item.title: Master Goldsmith (Level -inf)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.
